Tiles.Name: TombColonies
Tiles.Description: 塵、残響。空気に混ざるセピア。ここらは墓人街近辺の海域だ。@{I}$Tomb[- ]Colon(y|ies) -> 墓人街$Dust, echoes: even a sepia tint to the air. These are the waters around the Tomb-Colonies.
